=============================
version - Version Information
=============================

.. automodule:: icalendar_anonymizer.version
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

Usage
=====

.. code-block:: python

    from icalendar_anonymizer import __version__, __version_tuple__

    print(f"Version: {__version__}")
    print(f"Version tuple: {__version_tuple__}")
